column4: hi, I'm new to linux. I just installed Ubuntu. can someone please help me with the sound ? my sound isn't working
is anyone sound working ?
if I ever had sound issues and solved them I would be in a position to help you... but my sound has always worked nicely =(
what sound card do you have?
type 'lsmod | grep soundcore'
do you know where I can find driver for my sound card ?
type 'lsmod | grep snd' and paste the results into http://rafb.net/paste/
can I pm you and paste it in pm ?
does it give you any errors when you try to play sound applications or does nothing happen at all...
nothing happen at all
goto applications => sound and video => volume control... I'm sure you've already tried this route out though...
yes ... I tried it ... nothing is muted
have you tried operating systems other than windows before? did the sound work in them?
no ... the sound work perfect in windows
did you use alsa to configure your card?
I don't think I did ... I dont know what alsa is
I dont know what is alsa .. can you show me ?
the package name is 'alsa-base'
thanks .. let me try it
if it isn't already installed you may also want 'alsa-utils'
it shows that alsa is installed in Synaptic package manager
thanks
I tried to play mp3 file with xmms
it's playing but there is no sound
